name: Sheena Campbell
text: I got my Dodge Avenger from Les Auto best decision I have ever made. The process was worry free and the miles and price were amazing. I tell all my friends and coworkers about them.

name: valerie posey
text: I have bought several vehicles from Les throughout the years.  Wonderful people always.

name: Phil Aime
text: This was the best experience buying a car. Being challenged credit wise from COVID, Philip and his staff did a great job making the payments meet my needs and a ride that help me in my job. Thank you Lr Auto Sales!!!

name: Tamika Miller
text: Great cars, great prices, a warranty you can't beat with a stick, and a mechanic on staff.

name: Jordan Campbell
text: Les and his family are amazing guys. I was hesitant at first to buy anything from anywhere that wasnt a "huge dealership". Les made me feel at ease. I had not one problem with getting approved for a 2007 Chrysler Sebring. I sat down with him and he explained everything with the car that's been done to the car. He gave us a HUGE guarantee on the engine and trans. I will never buy another car anywhere else....EVER.

name: Catherine Egeland
text: Fantastic father and son company. Les, the father, is very welcoming and is clear and straightforward about his sales and cars. Brent, the son, knows the details of the cars and can provide you accurate information as well. Catfish is a family cat who patrols the lot and welcomes everyone. Very friendly atmosphere!! (Purchased 2014 Mustang)

name: Railyn Cochran_YT
text: We bought a beautiful 2010 Mustang from Les and we are so proud of it...very nice people and easy to work with! They sat us down and went over everything about the vehicle and showed us all the work they done on it and what it looked like before anything was worked on! We had two small children the whole time and they didn't drag us around telling lies or hassling on their prices, he was upfront and told us what we needed to know and got us on our way in our beautiful car...it was a great experience and I would highly recommend them to anyone!

name: El sol Sol
text: My family have purchased Great Quality cars from there and I am truly happy to say I look forward to buying a car from this Wonderful Outstanding car lot thank you Kenneth Ross Auntie appreciate your refel

name: Dave Bailey
text: i have bought several vehicles from Les. and i would recommend this to be your first stop, i assure you it will be your last, great people to do business with, make you feel like family, i have and continue to refer friends and family and am up for a new car myself, looking for a great dependable vehicle at a great price? stop by today, im sure you'll be satisfied

name: Shasta Villari
text: Les is a great guy, very honest. He gave us a great deal on a rebuilt car. You can't even tell it's ever been salvaged. Put 33k miles on it and only had to replace the clutch.

name: Kimberly Payton
text: Awesome people to deal with! I love my car! I liked them so much that I sent my daughter to buy her car there and she loves hers too. Thank you Mr. Schmitt. You guys rock!

name: Michael Gentry (Gentry Real Estate)
text: I have 2 cars from Les so far. Great deals on both and love the family feel on his lot.  If you have a question he will make sure you know it and leave happy!!

name: Michael Marcrum
text: My avenger had a small issue. Brent Schmitt took care of asap. Great place to trade with.

name: Kevin Haney
text: I've bought 8 cars possibly 9 this Friday from les never had any problems with getting parts if needed. he's a good person in my book .his only color is green .

name: kim bailey
text: Leas auto sales is a wonderful group of people to work with when buying a car. No matter what it takes they will find out what’s wrong with a car if you have problems. I highly recommend!

name: Tammy Griffin
text: We have bought 3 cars from Les over the last 2 years. We have had a great experience. He has always been upfront and honest about the cars that we purchased.

name: Marvin McCoy
text: Not satisfied at all.  Haven't had my car 30 days and having problems with it.  I paid cash and he has yet to fix it. Probably because I am black, But it is cool. $6000 was a waste of my money and time.

name: Kevin Haney
text: Ive bought 6 cars from les,ive never had any problems with them at all ill probably buy 2 more .hes a good salesman and a great friend dig it!

name: Ronnie Payton
text: Great place to buy a car, always there when you need them .My whole family has bought from him and will continue

name: Wynter Rayne
text: i bought a 2001 honda civic dx a few months ago and was told all that was wrong with the car was bad struts and an oil valve cover gasket leak. After driving it for a little while, I realize the radiator was cracked, the fan wires were sliced and I had to wire it to a toggle switch just to turn my fans on,I had no side view mirrors, my glove box was broken, and I have a leaky transmission line. That sounds like a whole lot more than what i was told.

name: Bridget Jones
text: Les auto is an amazing and understanding place I'm buying a dodge advenger and love my car and les hes a great man and business man God bless him and his business I'd defiantly refer friends I try all the time...

name: Tyler Payton
text: Bought several cars always been fair and will differently buy again from him

name: Lisa Neukam
text: Nice people

name: Alicia Jones Smith
text: I love love them bought my Dodge Avenger from them!!!!

name: Denise Lewis
text: Honest sales

name: Daniel Sperry
text: Used to have good prices , now they want 80 percent of the retail price . All the tile is discontinued and most of the material is thrown about. Damaged goods and returns , you might as well save the trip and just buy retail .

name: Andee D
text: I had bought a 120.00 pressure washer. When I opened the box it was kissing a couple of items. They were so good at opening another box and replacing what was missing.

name: Jacob Voss
text: Decent inventory, but lacking customer service. I asked how much a wine refrigerator was, and they told me I would have to go find someone wearing a black polo and ask him. After walking the entire store once again I never saw a person wearing a black polo. I just walked out.

name: Judy Boike
text: Most helpful business we have been in.  Jack and Phillip went above and beyond to find supplies we needed.  Prices were good.

name: Trey Edwards
text: Awesome deals, never know what you're going to find. Amazing resource for anyone building or renovating.

name: Nobody nobody
text: super friendly. crazy good deals. 10/10 would go again

name: Jonathan Stroud
text: Amazing find. Everything you will ever need. Polite and excellent service from Mike at Meridian St.

name: Sherry Dobbins
text: 2 weeks before businesses shut down because of virus..I had shopped at the Meridian location. I had purchased several hundred dollars of items. So, many I had to use a Uhaul to pick up..I had purchased 2 mats for children one for grandson one for granddaughter came with characters to play on rugs that are printed, really cute...when I got home and unloaded truck. I had forgotten the two play rugs..i couldn't find a phone number so I looked them up on Facebook. I messaged them.they said they were at the desk. Mike the salesman had put them up for me..this was 2 weeks before everything came to a halt. Today, I finally went to Huntsville to see about getting the two mats. Mike was not there but the two people working found them taped together, waiting for me to come retrieve them...its been so long, I really wouldn't have fussed if they had sold them, because I really should have gotten them during the two weeks before everything shut down...Im thrilled to say they were there and I had no problem collecting them...I really enjoy their stores..

name: Jason A
text:
First time here (Jan '21). A lot of items didn't have prices listed. Basically, everything here is at a set 50% off from normal "big box store" pricing unless it's on sale. It'll save you a bit of time from having to take things up front asking for the price.

It is also categorized well. If you're looking for vanities, fans, lighting, tiles, flooring, shelving, etc. you'll find them all in the same area and not all over in different places. It'll definitely be one of my stops whenever I'm in town for my bi-weekly trips up to the area.

name: Melissa Harman
text: Just purchased some amazing new items from their Target Overstock drop. Saved hundreds of dollars!!

name: Michelle Williams
text: Lots of good stuff and reasonably priced. The new location is really nice and spacious. Deducted a star because the young lady working at the front counter/register responded to my questions as though she was uncomfortable talking to me or was just uncomfortable talking in general.

name: ginger mar
text: Always a wide variety of choices. Never know what you will find

name: Shawn Haseltine
text: This place has so many different categories! The employees are super nice. Prices are amazing

name: Johnnie Casale
text: Good, wide selection, but staff wasn't too friendly. Got more help from other customers than I did the staff.

name: Ernie D
text: Had The Pond I Wanted At A Great Price.

name: STEVE LESTER
text: Good prices, gotta do a little hunting for what your looking for, but that's the fun of it

name: Mark Toland
text: Similar to mike's. Large assortment of house repair and improvement items. They go for about half of scanned value.  Will be going back soon.

name: Linda Beach
text: Great prices.

name: Glenda Lambert
text: Lots of bargains. Hard to find prices on some things

name: Hamid Baraty
text: Lots of things, big stuff and little stuff

name: wilbur cornner
text: Great people and got part I needed..at great price...

name: Bacon Reach
text: Great experience wonderful people and great pricing

name: Eric Mosley
text: Was very nice on the phone and helped me find part I needed. Pricing was very fair.

name: Supa CG
text: Would give 0 stars if I could. Called and asked for a specific part. They give me a part but off the wrong year car. One difference... there was a sway bar tab on the year car I own that was missing. I had someone else go pick it up for me and did not get to see it until the part was at my home. They knew this was the case keep in mind... I go back the next day to try and replace it and they didn’t have it. They then would not refund me. The part was picked and sold to my mother after being very specific about what I needed and they just made a mistake. No biggie but it is ridiculous to not make good on it... they tried to convince me that I should just put it on and not attach the sway bar and after that the thought I would let him weld a tab on there. No way. I don’t trust his judgement and measurements to the precision that they might need to be at. Especially seeing as how he was pissed with me. 0 stars

name: Honey Ledlow
text: Very friendly.

name: Blu
text: Great service

name: Sonya Johnson
text: Very friendly had just what we were looking for and decent prices

name: bryant vick
text: Good folks reasonable prices

name: David Long
text: I was in the area from Anniston and needed a part.  This place was awesome!  The people couldn’t have been nIcer.  I would definitely recommend!

name: Melissa Trowbridge
text: If i could give 6 or more stars i would .  Being a woman and not knowing much about cars or salvage yards they they treated me very respectful and helpful .  I highly recommend baldwin auto salvage . Prices were cheaper  than anyone else i called.   I needed a jack and spare tire for my impala. For 60 dollars i got just that plus they took my old spare, put everything in my trunk like new and threw in the carpet spare tire cover .  Thank you guys .

name: Calvin Gray
text: Owner is a very nice guy, & employees are friendly as well. If they don't have the used auto part you are looking for they will go the extra mile in locating it at another yard for you. I been dealing with them from first opening day.

name: Samuel Kulman
text: Very  knowledgeable staff, Great price and 30 day warranty on a '96 Ford Explorer starter.  Will buy from again.

name: Major Carr
text: These guys are the best!!! Very helpful, friendly and prices are great! Will never go anywhere else! 5 stars all the way!!!

name: Audrey Tolbert
text: The customer servuce was amazing. The part i purchased was well worth it at an affordable price. This will be my go to place anytime i need parts.

name: Lee Green
text: Awesome place. They pull the parts for you quick and prices are really reasonable!

name: Matthew Bankston
text: Had exactly what I needed and only took less than 15 minutes to get it! Awesome!

name: Baxter Mcfarland
text: I would recommend this business to anyone in need of their services.  Professional and polite employees, and quality work.

name: Ron McBride
text: Great good guys and very helpful

name: Charlie Headley
text: Great place to do business

name: Kevin Himes
text: Great place to find used and new Auto parts

name: Melanie Edwards
text: What they want you to I want you to break your experience at the office

name: Ashia Odom
text: Good people

name: chris collins
text: Great people and great parts!!!

name: Michelle Himes
text: Awesome place.

name: Captain Miller
text: Very nice

name: Andy Elliott
text: Poor products
